Using Charts

Contents | Index

Charts let you view data in graphical form to assist with the analysis process. Different charts are associated with each screen. The available charts depend on the data displayed in the current screen. Not all screens offer charts.

To navigate to charts and filter chart data
  1. Navigate to the screen that contains the information for which you want to see charts.
  2. On the link bar, click the Charts link.
  3. Use the drop-down lists in the header of the chart to select the filter and type for the chart.
    The chart you selected appears.
